metadata.title: Meeting with coordination - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator

content_blocks.text: Would you like to learn more about the Postgraduate Course in Cyber Security and clarify all your doubts? We are organizing exclusive meetings with the course coordinator, Prof. Victor Machado, especially for you. During this conversation, you will have the opportunity to:
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator

content_blocks.text: Get to know the academic program in depth and understand the skills and competencies you will develop;
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator

content_blocks.text: Discover Inteli's differentials, the PBL methodology and the partnership with leading market experts;
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator

content_blocks.text: Clear up all your doubts about the course, the career in cybersecurity and the possibilities that the future offers.
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator

content_blocks.text: The meetings are online, from 7pm to 8pm, on the following dates:
content_blocks.section: Take part in an exclusive meeting with the Course Coordinator
content_blocks.subsection: The meetings are online, from 7pm to 8pm, on the following dates:
